column2: feelings of affection, compassion, sympathy, attachment to someone or something
to have a lot of Jeong, to be warmhearted
to become attached to (having affection for each other)
to lose Jeong, cut attachment with someone (begin to dislike)
an intrinsic sense of joy, pleasure
to cause someone to feel joy, excitement
to have a lot of energy, excitement
to place emphasis on blood ties
to feel a sense of community
to have sympathy or bias for someone (neg)
to give and take, scratch each other's backs
to go through good times and bad times together
just when we started becoming familiar we had to say goodbye
to express one's way of thinking
for one’s shoulders to dance in excitement (jiggle, heave 동사)
to rise up, come up, emerge
I’ll throw in a more for free.
